full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS) Requirement

#### Solicitation Number: 2023-15186

**Publication Date:** 2022-11-29
**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-20T14:00:00
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Tender Status:** Expired

#### Description
The Department of National Defence is inviting bidders to submit proposals for Task-Based Professional Services (TSPS). This project falls under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

#### Services Required
The successful bidder will provide human resource services, including business consulting and change management, project management services, and other related tasks as specified in the request for proposal.

#### Bidding Documents
The bid documents, including the request for proposal, are available on the Canada Buys website.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:
Dan Caughey
Daniel.caughey@forces.gc.ca

#### Relevant Attachments
Please find the tender documents, including the English and French versions of the request for proposal and amendment, attached below.

*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/29/5482d034ba419cf9d2a82ee2445ce52d/2023-15186_-_task-based_npp_english.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/29/e6595e3b818b4a2a549819d554008fde/2023-15186_-_task-based_npp_french.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/f5cfe996682de1a1c785f895f9e77786/2023-15186_-_task-based_npp_french_-_amend_001.pdf
*   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/07/2cb6bf00bc2374066457ec64c32e9d7c/2023-15186_-_task-based_npp_english_-_amend_001.pdf

Note: Please ensure to check the tender closing date as it has expired. This tender announcement serves as an archive.
